title: Clients Are 'Exhausted' and Want to Retire Early. Advisors Can Help.
description: The pandemic is making people recognize that "life is not forever and they want to bring more purpose and intentionality to it," says Julie Kelly, a financial advisor with Edward Jones.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: The pandemic is making people recognize that "life is not forever and they want to bring more purpose and intentionality to it," says Julie Kelly, a financial advisor with Edward Jones.
